# Divine Inspiration (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[Sanctified Spells|Sanctified 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** Sacrifice

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature touched

**Duration:** 1d4 rounds

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 96

This spell helps to tip the momentum of combat in the favor of good, granting limited precognitive ability that enables the spellâ€™s recipient to circumvent thedefenses of evil opponents. The target of the spell gains a +3 sacred bonus on all attack rolls made against evil creatures. This bonus does not apply to attacks made against nonevil creatures.

*Sacrifice:* 1d2 points of Strength damage.
